name: Advanced Caching for Squid Proxy Cache
short_description:
Improve the Performance of your Linux Squid Proxy Cache !

Advanced Caching Add-On for Linux Squid Proxy Cache for Videos, Music, Images, Libraries, CDNs, etc...

By default your existing Squid Cache cannot properly cache most popular multi-media websites like YouTube, Netflix, Facebook, DailyMotion, Vimeo, Vevo, Google Maps & Apps, Apple, Tumblr, Yandex, etc...
Now there is a quick and easy solution and within 5 minutes you can load this Squid add-on to significantly improve the caching possibilities and performance of your Squid Cache.

More than 800+ websites are already supported and can be cached automatically in order to get the best out of your existing Internet bandwidth.

List of all supported web sites: http://www.unveiltech.com/videosboost.php

SquidVideoBooster works with Squid v2.7, v3.4 and v3.5.

You will immediately save money and satisfy your users who will enjoy a better Internet experience.

Try our free 30 days trial version and see the performance.
